website_summaries.verdict: The best budget set of neodymium magnets meant for arts and crafts or small projects.
pros: Small, round profile makes these magnets suitable for smaller art projects
Comes with an adhesive backing for nonmagnetic surfaces or for extra strength
Able to hold up to 17 lbs
cons: Known to break easily when dropped onto hard surfaces like a wood floor

customer_reviews.title: Kinda laughing through the pain. I’d read to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Kinda laughing through the pain. I’d read to be careful NOT to get your finger caught between these (SUPER STRONG!) magnets. I tried. I really did! Oops! I’m thinking there’s a chance that these little beauties just may be beyond my pay grade...
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Christensen

customer_reviews.title: VERY STRONG MAGNETS...WATCH VIDEO ON HOW TO SEPARATE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I have these all over my house. After losing a few pints of blood I have figured out how to handle and separate them. I use them for holding tools, curtains, etc. I just love them. I don't have enough no matter how many I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Super - finds nails faster than normal stud finders
customer_reviews.text: Super - finds nails faster than normal stud finders. I super-glued a couple of these magnets to sawed off dowels, (make the dowels short so that their weight doesn't compete with the magnets searching). One of the things I like about using these is that it's possible to use one to find a stud line and just leave it there until you're ready to begin your project. Caution on separating the individual magnets upon receipt ... they are mega, as in hugely powerful - so much so that if you get two of them stuck together, it's a challenge to get them unstuck.
customer_reviews.author: tebaho

customer_reviews.title: Truly super strength
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are super powerful. I bought a different brand supposedly "super strength" and they failed even when I used all 20 of them. I used four of these, one on each corner for stability, but I could have gotten away with using just 1 or 2 of them. They are very powerful, and packaged very well. It was easy to separate them with the dividers and plastic sheathing. If you want a small magnet that can hold some weight, or stay put on a fridge door that's opened frequently, get these. They're between the size of a quarter and silver dollar, if measurements throw you off.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody7549

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly powerful magnets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these magnets to help hold a magnetic mount motorcycle tank bag. The manufacturer of the tank bag didn't use strong enough magnets. These babies, holy cow! If they were any stronger you couldn't get them apart. These are the real deal and only buy them if you have a need for the strongest magnets out there. In my use, simply placing one of these over the existing magnets at each corner reinforced the strength so much I no longer have any issues with the tank bag blowing loose..
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Heavily Magnetic
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these to keep the shower curtain from billowing out while showering, but they also hold my washcloth on the side of the tub and will firmly attach just about anything that isn't too think to any metallic surface. I did drop one and the plastic lining broke, but I don't regard that as problematic. I could easily glue the pieces back on if I felt they were necessary. These are not flimsly, light magnets and are strong enough to use with magnetic slime, for anyone who enjoys science. I imagine there are other uses that I will eventually come up with.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi M.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, don't let them touch each other! SNAP!  have to slide them off.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Bought because the shower curtain liner was always flapping about. Put three of these in separate snack zip bags and placed them between the already three supplied magnets on my liner. If you put the bath on more than a trickle then turn on the shower, the liner wants to fly up and flap about, but these magnets hold tight! I'm sure these will hold during a tornado/typhoon! Put on the fridge? Be prepared to slide it over to the edge to remove it
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: The safer choice. Great packaging makes safer to handle.
customer_reviews.text: The sellers of these magnets were very thoughtful. They separated each magnet with plastic as well as foam spacers. This makes these magnets much safer to handle. The magnets are powerful and they made these magnets safer to handle. If you are in the market for small neodymium magnets, feel free to purchase them and not get your fingers nipped!. Overall, a good purchase. I believe this is the safest way of package them Still, (because of their strength,) be careful. After all they are the highest power of neodymium magnets available. By the way, after I purchased these little wonders, I went back and purchased several more!. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Tondelayo

customer_reviews.title: Nice magnets
customer_reviews.text: The red line to mark the POS. pole is a nice feature, and probably saved me from pinching my fingers a time or two. They come as pictured with the plastic washers separating them, makes it easier to get them apart.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Holy magnet, Batman!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! We bought these for my daughter to use with "homemade magnetic slime"! If you need magnets that will attract an object 5 miles away, or never let something slip, these are the magnets for you! They are so strong that they are dangerous! I put one on my wrist and one on the back of my wrist, and they stayed in place! Be careful though, they are so charged that they can hurt you by pinching the skin (pic attached is the painful pinch)!!!! Great magnet for industrial uses!
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Brittle
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnetism, very brittle conductor. Be careful when pulling these off or they will break like this:
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to separate
customer_reviews.text: These come in a clump of six. I don't care how strong you are or what kind of tools you use. It is simply not possible to separate these magnets. If you want one cylinder-shaped magnet, go for it. Otherwise, don't bother. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Delicate, but useful depending on their intended application.
customer_reviews.text: I took two out of the plastic covers and they shot together quickly and one of the magnets shattered into tiny pieces... But that makes sense due to how thin they are. Just be careful with them when you take the plastic bumpers off them. I also liked how they included the double sided 3m stickers. That made installation for my purpose much easier. Although the magnets are so darn strong that if the 3m tape stuff isn't strongly adhered to the surface you are using them on, the magnet strength rips them right off. LUCKILY I was using them on wood, so after a few minutes of pushing them hard onto the surface, they stayed fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Bailey

customer_reviews.title: VERY stout magnet
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize HOW strong these little button magnets are. Put them on my stainless steel fridge...almost can't take em off! They are powerful. UPDATE (April 23, 2018) - Can one fall in love with a button magnet? Just reordered 2x six-pack of these beasts. You can use a dab of super glue on an item and attach these guys...learned this trick and now going to use them for some MORE items. Thanks CMS...you guys made a great product with thousands of uses! May 5, 2018 - Bought some more. Yeh, they are that good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets.  Great for use on my shower curtain.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on my shower curtain to help keep it stuck to the tub. My shower curtain came with magnets, but they are very weak. These are about 1" round and very strong. Following the advice of other reviewers, I was careful when first separating them. I attached them magnetically to my tub, and whenever the magnets on my shower curtain get anywhere near them . . . whamo!! they get pulled together and hold very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Very strong magnets, not a toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to attach one of the magnets to the back of my computers RGB remote so I can keep it attached to my computer when not in use. These work fantastic for that, I really only needed 1 but the pack was well worth it. I was very impressed in how well it held to my computer case, I dont expect to loose my remote with these. These are also not a toy, they are very very strong and could potentially hurt you if not handled properly. Keep them in the plastic storage discs until you need them as well, if you stick them together you'll have a difficult time separating them again.
customer_reviews.author: NOB0D3Y

customer_reviews.title: So cool!  Super strong!!
customer_reviews.text: They weren't joking by saying these are the strongest magnets, and these magnets from CMS magnetics definitely live up to the hype. If the magnets get stuck together without spacers, it's a little difficult to remove them. The way I separate them is by wearing latex gloves for added grip. The magnets themselves are very nice. They look like regular refrigerator magnets but my god do they out perform them. These magnets are also great for testing the diamagnetic properties of silver bars. All in all, if you are looking for some serious magnets, these are your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Jer Javier

customer_reviews.title: These magnets are STRONG!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnets. Will stay stuck where you put them, too well sometimes, but that's what you want. Don't get your finger between two of them, it will get smashed. They're hard to get apart if you put 2 of them together. Make sure to use the plastic separators between them if they're in a stack. One of them holds my favorite wrench to the top of my toolbox very well. They'd work great on a hide a key underneath your car situation. I'd buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: esp...

customer_reviews.title: Super strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived, the magnets were in the little plastic spacers you see, inside a cardboard sleeve, and inside a cardboard box. Even through all of that, the batteries that were also in the package were stuck to the magnet box. If you get your finger between them and let go, it will smash your fingers, they are seriously strong. I have one of these on the triple clamp of my motorcycle and have had no issues with it coming off. I haven't tried removing it, but it probably wouldn't be easy (but why would you want it to be?).
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Super Powerful Magnet
customer_reviews.text: This magnet is very powerful, and I stamp greeting cards and I needed a magnet to hold the card in place. Well I does that and it was a little too high in dimension, and I found out my stamp wouldn't stamp all the way on the paper, so I had to move the magnet, so I could stamp the image again. I put painters tape on the magnets to help me be in charge of the magnets and that works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Cookies 3412

customer_reviews.title: Hard to grip
customer_reviews.text: Depending on what you're using them for, I wanted them to fasten a tarp on my car windshield in the winter. I couldn't get a hold of the magnets to get it off. I finally ended up just pulling on the tarp and letting it all go flying. And they stuck to each other and I had a hard time getting them separated. I felt like the 3 Stooges. They are definitely STRONG, about the size of a quarter. I should have bought thicker ones that I could grip.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsygirl7

customer_reviews.title: Be careful handling these or you'll be sorry like I was
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and powerful magnets. Be careful handling these or you'll be sorry like I was. They will pinch your skin as they draw to each other. They join each other so hard that I cracked 2 of them just handling them to get them apart and they snapped back together. I learned that you must handle these with a putty knife and a small set of pliers. Unreal power from these quarter sized disc. Very strong indeed.
customer_reviews.author: jdv500

customer_reviews.title: Super strong magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Using them to keep my shoulder puppets on my shoulder when I am strolling around different events with them. They have a metal saddle that goes under the sleeve of my blouse and I needed strong magnets to put on them to keep them on the saddle so that they don't fall off my shoulders. These things were perfect and can be used for many different things. I'm going to get more to use to put up privacy curtains in my van when I'm traveling and camped out somewhere. An excellent product and an excellent buy. I will be getting more in the future for sure.
customer_reviews.author: maria c.

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong
customer_reviews.text: I used these to keep my shower curtain in place on my claw-foot bathtub. They worked great and are super strong, as advertised. They did start molding a little bit though, so that's my one word of caution if using in water.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: question on north side
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnets; however, I have a question as to which is the north side. The diagram would lead you to believe the red stripe is the north side. When I attach them to my other magnets from Polar magnets, which are well marked as to north and south, that shows that the north side is the unmarked side on this product, not the red stripe. Kind of important to know because when used for healing, you place the north side towards the skin as I understand it. I do not have a compass to test these. Anybody out there want to do further tests to clarify or can CMS jump in?
customer_reviews.author: L. Robins

customer_reviews.title: Soooooooo STRONG - almost too strong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to make an add on color for a coat. Sewing them in collar was a challenge but they are so thin and STONG. I kept the last spacers in-between at all times so they wouldn't get stuck together. No breakage or hurt finger and the collar stays snapped on my jacket. AMAZINGLY STRONG!
customer_reviews.author: Milk

customer_reviews.title: Good, Well Packaged
customer_reviews.text: They're titled as "Super Powerful" magnets. Don't get the complaints about how hard they are to separate, or they injured or caused someone to bleed. Why did they order them? Suggest searching for "Non-Powerful Magnets." What I was looking for, they do the job on a steel door. Will pull other items to them if too close. Delivery fast. Packaged well in plastic sleeves inside a cardboard tube with end caps. Round 3M sticker pads included. Don't break at all compared to other magnet packs advertised as "powerful," appear to be well-made with sturdy metals.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Put Your Finngers Between Them
customer_reviews.text: Ok, 5/5 for the magnets! They are amazing and can hold a lot of weight, but the stickers? They suck. They lasted a week and then things started coming off. I stuck a piece of paper on one to see how long it'd last and it lasted 2 weeks. Not quality stickers whatsoever. Also please, keep your fingers from between them. My husband is an idiot and cut his finger playing with them, when the came together.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Batman

customer_reviews.title: Strong Neodymium magnets with removable safety collar
customer_reviews.text: The reason I chose these super powerful Neodymium magnets over some other choices is that they are surrounded by a removabel collar and came packaged with additional plastic dividers to make it easier to separate. is that I have they can be difficult to separate and break easily. The collars are a brilliant safeguard and not permanently attached I plan on keeping them on while using them as an extra precaution.
customer_reviews.author: 🤗Ovrjoyd🤗

customer_reviews.title: These are strong. And yes if you are not ...
customer_reviews.text: These are strong. And yes if you are not careful you can brake one (i did when it flew off the table onto another at about 6 inches - it also pinched the skin on my finger causing it to bleed). I used them to hold a shim inside a guitar body where I could not clamp (they were great) but I ambitious and tried to do 2 at once about 6 inches apart- that didn't work out. You really need to keep the magnets a safe 8 inches or more from each other or they will fly.
customer_reviews.author: mcg

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets. Don’t place in pockets if you have piercings.
customer_reviews.text: These little suckers are strong. Goodness. The only reason I’m giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because I only got 9 of the 10 I ordered. One might be stuck on the 18 wheeler they were shipped in and that would be understandable. Edit: All 10 are here. 2 got stuck together when I pulled them apart and I didn’t notice. Updated to 5 stars, and I should also add that if you have any screws/pins/rods in your body I’d also be careful. This proves that these might be deadly. I’m going to have some fun with them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kalman

customer_reviews.title: I like the plastic discs surrounding the magnets and the protective  way they were packaged .
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra money to have the superior protective packaging . Especially the plastic discs surrounding the individual magnets . Makes these powerful magnets much easier and safer to handle . I used one on my steel kitchen cabinets as door fasteners . Worked good with the plastic disc left on the magnet . Keeps the door closed but not too hard to open .
customer_reviews.author: Sincere

customer_reviews.title: INSANELY STRONG MAGNETS!
customer_reviews.text: I have never experienced magnets of this strength!!! I put 3 of them on one side of my forearm and the other 3 on the opposite side to show my kids how strong they are. That was a mistake, they slid off the side of my arm and snapped together pinching my flesh in between leaving a bruise and a blood blister! And now I cannot get them apart, I even tried a screwdriver! I'm sure I could if I really wanted to but I cannot do it with my bare hands, maybe if it were only two but not all 6 stacked together.
customer_reviews.author: SaltySailor

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They’re about the size of a quarter ...
customer_reviews.text: He said the strongest Magness I’ve ever encountered! I love them. They’re about the size of a quarter And quite powerful! They come with plastic oh rings in between them for a reason. Be very careful pulling them apart as you don’t want to lose the ring and have them stacked together. They’re very difficult to separate then. But they’re fabulous magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Useless due to defective adhesive- Poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: The seller argued with us instead of acknowledging the issue and then was unresponsive. 3M adhesive began to fail after less than one day on the magnet side. This means user error was not a factor. The stickers I received were either defective or not cleaned when installing on the magnet. Reviews like this are totally avoidable if customer service sent a replacement and acknowledged my problem. DON'T GIVE BUSINESS TO SELLERS THAT DON'T CARE ABOUT CUSTOMER SUPPORT.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful magnet for its size
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are useful to hold many things in place but they are surprisingly powerful so they "jump" to the surface you are trying to stick to. The pads provided with the magnets allow a softer stick to the surface. The magnet set of 6 is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Z

customer_reviews.title: Super strong
customer_reviews.text: These magnets were very very strong but they just weren’t what I was looking for. I was using them inside my aquarium to attach some shelf rock and they were strong enough to hold the rocks but eroded eventually. I read online that neodymium was ideal for use in aquariums but apparently that was not accurate. I think I just need to try a different type of magnet for what I’m looking for. Other than that, they were extremely strong and were able to hold up 2-3 pound rocks. I was very impressed with their performance but I think they’d be better for other uses around the house or whatever. Just watch your fingers because again they’re extremely strong magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: These are super strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: The magnets work just as expected but the only con I have is they are very difficult to separate for someone with limited hand strength. When I would try to separate them, the nylon ring would slip out and the magnets would snap together. It actually did it so quick it pinched and broke the skin on my hand between my thumb and first finger! My only suggestion would be a slightly different shape nylon ring to aid in separation.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle T.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT MAGNETS FOR MY USE
customer_reviews.text: I repair stringed instruments and use magnets like these in closing cracks and aligning parts before gluing. I truly like these. Great strength to weight and I’ve used them with the included guards in place which makes them easier to release. I’m glad I bought two packs of 6. I’ll likely purchase more of them.
customer_reviews.author: RickR

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these magnets. I use to keep objects within reach in case of an emergency. The plastic rings that come in them keep the metal surfaces from being scratched by the magnet when it "grabs" the object to beheld. Cheaper than buying premade. Very strong and we'll made.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: JEEZ. I wanted magnets, but these are practically ...
customer_reviews.text: JEEZ. I wanted magnets, but these are practically weapons. They are so incredibly strong that when you try to separate them, they fly back together so fast you'd have to be a ninja to get your fingers out of the way. I pinched my fingertip so badly I thought it would never stop bleeding. No way should you get these if you aren't extremely strong.
customer_reviews.author: Keaty

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding cell phone in place.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very strong magnets as described. I used them to put one in my cell phone case (iPhone 6 plus with an Otterbox case) and put one on the cellphone holder in my truck. Now the phone stays on the holder with just the magnets and it is easy to remove and replace. The magnet is strong enough that it will hold my phone on a vertical metal surface.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Really Strong Magnets
customer_reviews.text: No exaggeration these are very strong magnets. I tried placing one on each side of my hand and they stay in place even when I move my hand around. This was the second time I ordered them in the last few weeks as I gave most of the first order away to friends. I use them to reduce elbow and hip soreness. I'm not sure but I suspect they could negatively affect somethings that shouldn't be around strong magnets such as credit cards and cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: Dean K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not very strong.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shape and finish on the magnets, but they're not very strong. We have teeny ones (smaller than 1/2 of a tic-tac) that are much more powerful - they'll hold small stacks of paper to the fridge compared with just a few sheets that these can hold.) Got them to use with homemade magnetic silly putty, but they are kind of disappointing. On the plus side, you can easily get them apart if you don't want to use them in a stack.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Taylor

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise fine...
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as I was expecting based on other reviews, almost anything flat and iron that is attracted to this magnet will slide to the sides and disengage with just a tiny bit of weight. IE, I wanted this to hold my galaxy S9+ that has a flat iron plate attached to the back; a phone is not really that heavy, but it slides right off.
customer_reviews.author: tortugaveloz

customer_reviews.title: It got here quickly with just standard shipping. Price was a good.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to just use here and there for odd tasks in the lab. They are very strong and if you let them get together you are not going to get them apart very easily. The sticky backs are real handy, and if you use the nylon rings it helps when you need to actually remove them. They are really strong!
customer_reviews.author: G. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Strong
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly strong. You must exercise extreme care when using them. One magnet will draw another to itself from over 6-7 inches away. When this happens, they break easily. They will pull away from your hands when they're close to metal. I would give these a 5 for strength but I am giving them a 4 because they break easily.
customer_reviews.author: D. Porrey

customer_reviews.title: Strong!
customer_reviews.text: Strong! Be careful! I could see how these magnets could break or pinch a finger if their interactions are not carefully controlled. The included bumpers are incredibly useful.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because the magnets I had wouldn’t hold up my whiteboard. I wasn’t actually expecting them to be amazing but they are!!! They are super strong!!!!!! The only problem I have had with them is trying to separate them when they are attached!!! So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: feney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hold up my multi-meter on metal doors at work. These magnets are super strong and I have used on a few occasions for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnets.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work to attach a map to the hood of my vehicle and definitely keeps it in place. I keep the spacers on and it doesn't seem like it'll be at risk of breaking bones or causing harm like that. They seem strong but not that strong. I'm still careful when I restack them, however. I hold it a few inches away until I can feel which side is being attracted and release from there.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Another set of strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Keep the plastic separators on them until ready to use. Breaks the magnetic field between them, but they will still react with each other and snap back.
customer_reviews.author: Mudrat54

customer_reviews.title: After buying some so-so magnets for crafts, I decided ...
customer_reviews.text: After buying some so-so magnets for crafts, I decided this time I was going to buy some MAMMA JAMMA - HOLD ANYTHING magnets! Whew! These are some STRONG magnets! Just a tip, though....don't remove the plastic dividers that separate them UNTIL you're ready to use the next one. If they get stuck together, it takes a little manpower to get them separated!
customer_reviews.author: Deenie

customer_reviews.title: Quite thin...
customer_reviews.text: These are fine, perhaps even great, if you realize how thin they are. I did not realize just how thin they are until I received them and for my use case I probably needed them to be a little thicker. I did, however find a use for them in low profile applications (such as holding devices to metal doors and refrigerators that will be holding pens, markers, etc. and you don't want it to stick too far out in the cup).
customer_reviews.author: Interested Reader

customer_reviews.title: very Super strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Good God, these things are stronger than I expected, way stronger. I use them to find stud screws, so far they have not pulled any screws out!! If you have weak fingers you will not get them apart. Should be a way to rate the power of these newer magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Fiorillo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but i would recommend thicker ones.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful. I broke most mine as a result off letting them stick together and fighting them apart from each other, which in most cases i have to use a screwdriver. So just don't let them touch each other and the should last a very long time. If i buy any of these again i will buy thicker ones because these are pretty easy to break.
customer_reviews.author: Darien

customer_reviews.title: Great for 'dash' cameras
customer_reviews.text: Powerful magnets! Thankfully, not so powerful, they affect the dash camera I use these to 'stick' to the front windscreen of my car. Be very, very careful to not get your skin pinched between two of them. You'll do it only one time, but the blood blister will last for a week (even if you break it)
customer_reviews.author: kellyb

customer_reviews.title: Strong little magnets. Purchased them to place in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong little magnets. Purchased them to place in my motorcycle tank bag flaps since the magnets that came with the bag are weak. Tested the magnets out today and they held my bag to my tank without the bag shifting around on the tank. This was tested while going at very fast speeds, can't say any specifics, but trust me when I say "fast speeds." Minus one star because one of the magnets broke from attaching to the tank. I guess the force from the magnet hitting the tank caused the magnet to break.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Strong but may break
customer_reviews.text: This is a tricky review due to the fact that it was easy to assemble & remove but didn't last. These magnets are strong but not the strongest I have encountered. It was packaged thoughtfully. It also didn't last because of the thickness of the magnets. After a few uses, the power of magnets are a bit strong for the size and shape causing 1 to crack afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Jujubee

customer_reviews.title: I love strong magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Really strong magnets for the size! Came well wrapped and separated with spacers so you can slide them apart without breaking your nails or accidentally cracking the magnets. Appreciate the red stripe to give you force indicators then putting magnet on magnet. These work great through several layers of fabric/insulation.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good strong magnets and do very well for what I wanted them for. Some care needs to be taken or you will catch your fingers in them as they are good strong magnets.
customer_reviews.author: I. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Watch your fingers
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a little bit later than I anticipated, but these are some VERY STRONG magnets!!!!! Watch your fingers, or you will end up with blood blisters when you put the discs back together after separation.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: These magnets are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are no joke! I've used them for different things all over the house and they have been able to hold anything and everything I can test them with. The plastic dividers are incredibly helpful - if you get them stuck together without one of those in between, good luck to you!
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: They are strong little magnets.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep my headliner in my 2010 F150 up. It was dropping just behind the sunroof. Nothing I did before worked to keep it up. I used silicone sealant to secure several of them in place and the magnets cling to the metal roof perfectly. No more droopy headliner.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Wink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and strong.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to get strong enough magnets for a small whiteboard for my fridge. Nothing I could find would hold it in place, and wouldn’t stay stuck to the board. These were absolutely perfect. Fixed my problem instantly. Very strong magnets, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: put these on a efluky fan for on the spot cooling
customer_reviews.text: put these on a efluky fan for on the spot cooling
customer_reviews.author: rob Im a real person

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously strong! be smart with them>> <<
customer_reviews.text: Wow ! incredibly strong magnets for there size .15 -20lbs of pull I'd estimate .be mindful while handling as they will hurt .my idea behind buying these magnets is to experiment with the possibility of a extremely intricate perpetual motion machine that ive been thinking about
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution, they can really "snap" you.
customer_reviews.text: Super duper magnetic! Really cool, but also easy to get some hurt fingers and caught skin when they "snap" together suddenly. My 12 year old is afraid to handle these after a few snap, but it did the job we needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Dragontamer8872

customer_reviews.title: Keeping RV organized
customer_reviews.text: Using them in an RV. They’re nice and strong; keeping scissors handy and stuck to oven hood; they would easily hold up a good size knife if you put sticky-tape on the wall side
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly strong. Seriously
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Be careful, these things mean business. Do NOT consider these simple or basic magnets. They are very strong. They come separated by little plastic rings, those rings have saved my life! I made the mistake of setting them on my table about 6 inches apart...took me 45 minutes to get them detached!
customer_reviews.author: Angelsmom

customer_reviews.title: So strong I can’t get them apart.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely powerful. Used it for my magnetic slime. Alll of the magnets attracted to each other and now I can’t pull them apart. I don’t know if I ever will be able too.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Good magnets
customer_reviews.text: Used these for holding down my shower curtain, and they did the job as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great, Fun and Strong!
customer_reviews.text: Wow these things are addicting to play with,I bought these the use on a car door repair alongside a magnetic contact switch for a door sensor. I ended up playing with these Extra strong things for 3-4 days before doing my repair lol But they work for my use and are strong!
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Soul

customer_reviews.title: Super strengthy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting them to actually be as strong as the reviews suggested. My friends (love-hate relationship) thought it was funny to stick two together and watch me try to separate them without dying. I'm a relatively small woman, I couldn't separate them without something in-between. My larger guy friend was actually the only one who could do it. It was an interesting time but I'm pretty happy with them. I got them to mount some cosplay Mercy wings but I won't need as many as I thought originally. Hopefully with a few layers in between they'll be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: So strong hard to get apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these super strong magnets to put on automobile and big lawnmowers oil filter to catch any loose magnetic particles in the lubricating oil. The suggestion to use a magnet on an oil filter came from a youtube video on oil changes.
customer_reviews.author: Python22

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: These are strong magnets for very small items. I had empty 3" inch square gift boxes I wanted to magnetize for a game. The boxes slide down when I try to hold the board up. I read magnets of N50 power or greater are ideal. These are N45. You can't return them once they're affixed to your stuff of course.
customer_reviews.author: chickadee

customer_reviews.title: powerful magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Magnets function excellently. Would be better if one side was marked north or south. Would be 5 stars if the adhesives included gripped better.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Raymond Durussel

customer_reviews.title: Great, strong magnets!
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY strong, if they didn't have the plastic separators you would need tools to pull them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Matrix

customer_reviews.title: these are wicked strong. used them to keep closet ...
customer_reviews.text: these are wicked strong. used them to keep closet doors closed I can hide them under the paint behind a wood plug or veneer and no one knows what is keeping the door closed.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Keogh

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally strong magnets. I made the mistake of letting two of them click together and it was difficult to slide them apart. I can't imagine how difficult it would be to get one off the side of a refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. My “medicine cabinet “ door. But they are very strong- had them About 6” apart in 2 piles & they came alive . Slammed together & when I tried to separate them they caught my finger between 2 magnets & drew blood 😳
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my glass white board where standard ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my glass white board where standard magnets are too weak to stick. But they are so strong they jump out of my hand and I'm afraid they will break the glass. Now I use them for refrigerator magnets. Don't put them directly on each other or you will have a hard time pulling them apart!
customer_reviews.author: david5253

customer_reviews.title: We had four of them stack up on each other and to get them apart I used a jar opener to help get a good grip to slide one off th
customer_reviews.text: Wow these things are powerful! They worked perfectly for what I needed. Be careful when you are taking them apart and putting them back together that you keep the plastic spacers in between otherwise it is very challenging to get back apart. We had four of them stack up on each other and to get them apart I used a jar opener to help get a good grip to slide one off the stack at a time.
customer_reviews.author: luke migas

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful! - VERY strong magnets.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a science fair project having to do with increasing magnets effect on speed of simple motor. VERY strong magnets and if you are not careful and they snap together will do a number on fingers, and some times they shatter. Definetly need to be used with adult supervision, but they worked well for the experiment.
customer_reviews.author: bud e. :-)

customer_reviews.title: Powerful magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are bigger than I thought they'd be (I guess I didn't read the description carefully before ordering) and are very powerful. I use them as fridge magnets, which is probably overkill but they do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Fahy

customer_reviews.title: This magnet is stronger by far than I expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: This magnet is stronger by far than I expected. Problem: Magnetic disks are so strong that it is very difficult to separate them, and have the potential to injure you if you get you skin between them. Magnetic force can move objects 4 inches or farther away. So if you get this, please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: DP Consultant

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Magnets, Poor Markings
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality magnets, but the marking for the negative side is done with just some kind of cheap marker that gets wiped off the first time to take the magnet in your hand. I wish there was a groove or some form of permanent mark on each magnets, as once you've held them in your hands, you won't know anymore which side is north. Great quality magnets otherwise, in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Luciano P.

customer_reviews.title: They do the job.
customer_reviews.text: These magnets do the job. They are strong enough but not super strong where they are hard to work with. I use them to mount my cellular phone holder and flashlight charger in my work car which has a metal console.
customer_reviews.author: Brahda808

customer_reviews.title: Very strong. Avoid getting them stuck together.
customer_reviews.text: These are very strong. Very difficult to separate if you inadvertently allow them to jump together. They are shipped with plastic spacers. Be careful. When you accidentally get two stuck together, separate them by forcing a non-magnetic blade between them.
customer_reviews.author: Patric

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cell phones. Need rubber surface for grip.
customer_reviews.text: I tried using two of these to hold my note 8, but since it's a smooth surface they pretty much slide, you need the ones with the rubber surface to give it some grip, these also kept messing with my pen, not good for cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Extremely powerful...use caution!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely powerful magnets. Not for the fridge! If you aren't careful they will slap together and you cannot get them apart again. I wasn't cautious enough and the magnets clamped together pinching the meat out of two fingers. But for what I needed them for they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: I. M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the BEST magnets I've purchased. I suggest getting mounting tape if you are planning to fix them to anything. I used hot glue to mount a whiteboard to my fridge and the process was very mess and challenging. The magnets weren't the problem, just how I was trying to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: These are some awesome magnets. I bought them to replace some missing ...
customer_reviews.text: These are some awesome magnets. I bought them to replace some missing cabinet magnets from my child proofing in the kitchen. They worked great for that when attached to some drawer knobs i had sitting around. These are about the size of a 50 cent peice for reference.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyHill

customer_reviews.title: I have to say it was kinda fun though it became a real challenge
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are unbelievably strong. Don't accidentally let them stick together the whole family struggled to get them appart. I have to say it was kinda fun though it became a real challenge. Mom won with a kitchen knife but even that was difficult not to mention dangerous. I don't recommend anyone trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie B

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and very strong
customer_reviews.text: Don't get your fingers in the way of these when they snap together. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: RWm

customer_reviews.title: very strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: very strong , not for normal or playing around use, without plastic divider very hard to seperate from each other and im 6’2 350lbs work out a lot
customer_reviews.author: nelson ny

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR THE FAINT OF HEART
customer_reviews.text: These are for experts only. I thought this was a strong magnet.... but then it exploded and nearly killed me when near another one....
customer_reviews.author: blair gemmer

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets.
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are so strong you really want to be careful not to let them meet while trying to unwrap them! I learned that the hard way. On the other hand, now I have four 1/8 thickness and one 1/4... Would be so much easier to separate if shipped with solid disc spacers instead of just circles.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq Nisar Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are exactly as advertised and were very strong. Too bad the double-sided tape supplied with them did not have the same characteristics. I used the magnets to mount some security cameras and within a few days the tape had failed. I replaced the tape with some higher quality stuff and they are now working great.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap, these are strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Was planning on using these to secure a weather tarp on my car when it snows, but these magnets are deathly strong and very hard to pull apart or to take off. You'll need a hard plastic spoon. I used an old baby spoon that was made of plastic and had a slope on it. Only way to pry these magnets apart.... so strong, be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: 6 Sets Super Powerful Neodymium Magnets Dia 1.26x1/8" w/ 3M Adhesives | Strong Disc Rare Earth Magnets in Non-Shattering Packages for Fridges, Crafting, Iron Filing Demo, Science & DIY Projects
feature_bullets: > SUPER STRONG NEODYMIUM MAGNETS : These Strong Disc Neodymium Magnets are Rare Earth Magnets w/ Strong Holding Force. They are Heavy Duty Neodymium Magnets with 3M Adhesive Backings. These Heavy Duty Strong Magnets can be used as Fridge or Refrigerator Magnets, Crafts Magnets, Green House or Garage Organizing, Office and Warehouse Holders, School Locker Holders and Magnetic Therapy etc.

> HANDY MAGNETS : These Flat Disc Magnets Come with 3M Foam Adhesive Backing and can be Used as Fridge magnets, Crafts, Magnetic Putty, Shower Curtain Weight, Magnetic Paint Wall, Magnetic Slime and Iron Powder or iron fillings, Door Magnets, Magnetic Sensor, Magnetic Levitation, Phone Car Mount Magnets, Science School Projects, Oil Filter Magnets, DIY Magnets, and Industrial Magnets
> SUPER STRONG NEODYMIUM MAGNETS FOR HEAVY DUTY APPLICATIONS : Being Rare Earth Magnets. Used for Reed Switch, Magnetic Sensors, Magnetic Relays

> UNIQUE NON-SHATTERING PACKAGE : Each Magnet is Individually Inserted Inside of Plastic Sleeve. Never Break When Collide into Each Other. QUALITY CONTROL UNDER ISO 9001: The Quality of These Strong Neodymium Magnet Discs is Under ISO 9001 Systems. Ni+Cu+Ni Triple Layer Coated Rare Earth Magnets for Rust Proof. These are Definitely the Quality Neodymium Magnets Available

> PROJECTS SUGGESTED : These Neodymium Magnets can be Used for School Science Projects or Education in the Classroom with Magnetic Sand or Iron Shaving, Iron Oxide, Magnetic Slime and Magnetic Ferrofluid
